function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High risk of economic loss due to prolonged closure of retail sales","Impact":"Loss of billions of euros in turnover, potential closure of thousands of companies, and significant impact on the national economy","Mitigation":"Government financial support, extension of relief measures, and investment in alternative business models","Technologies":"Digital platforms for online sales, remote work technology, and virtual event platforms","People":"Retail business owners, employees, and consumers","Owner":"Government, industry associations, and business owners"},{"Description":"Increased risk of permanent closure of small businesses","Impact":"Potential closure of 3700 companies, loss of jobs, and economic downturn in specific regions","Mitigation":"Targeted financial assistance, business continuity training, and support for transition to online business models","Technologies":"E-commerce platforms, digital marketing tools, and remote collaboration software","People":"Owners of small businesses, employees, and local communities","Owner":"Local government, business support organizations, and industry associations"},{"Description":"Risk of continued economic decline in service and entertainment sectors","Impact":"Severe loss of revenue, job cuts, and reduced consumer spending","Mitigation":"Diversification of services, investment in digital marketing, and development of COVID-safe event protocols","Technologies":"Virtual event platforms, contactless payment systems, and online booking systems","People":"Workers in the service and entertainment sectors, event organizers, and consumers","Owner":"Industry associations, event organizers, and business owners"}]}
